instructions: Open Pages, and if a document is already open, tap Documents or the Documents button in the top-left corner to see all your documents. Tap Select in the top-right corner, then tap the document (a tick appears). If you can t see the document you want to move, try searching for it, or tap Browse or Recents at the bottom of the screen. See Find a document . Tap the folder button at the bottom of the screen, then tap the folder or other location where you want to move the document. Tap Move in the top-right corner.

Go to Settings > Accessibility, then tap Side Button (on an iPhone with Face ID) or Home Button (on other iPhone models). Choose the speed required to double or triple-click. Choose how iPhone responds when you press and hold the side or Home button.
